name: RLE
short_description: Richlab exchange is a cryptocurrency exchange, opening a new era. With the integration of the following services: 1. Shopping 2. Commercial auctions 3. Equity investment 4. Game blockchain 5. Service payment system All of the above services are integrate
description: RLE(TRC20 Token Standard) is a token standard based on the implementation of smart contract when using TRON network to issue a token. This is the core value of the new Rich Lab Exchange. The total number of RLE tokens is 1,000,000,000 from which 210,000,000 RLE will be sold in IEO. The price of 1RLE during the IEO period will start from 0.01 USD to 0.016 USD
